summary: **Crayon Shin-chan** is a popular Japanese comic (manga) created by Yoshito Usui. It started in 1990 and ended in 2009 when Usui passed away. A new version continued in 2010 by his team. The story follows a naughty kindergartener named Shin-chan. It's also a TV show, airing since 1992 with over 1000 episodes. The show is very successful, dubbed into 30 languages and watched in 45 countries. The manga and TV series have sold over 148 million copies, making it one of the top-selling manga series ever.
title: Crayon Shin-chan
